QueryResult.text: SELECT CACHEID, PROJECTID, TASKID, WBSLEVEL, WBSSEQUENCE, PAR_SEQ, NNB_SEQ, INCLUDE, VISIBLE, CLIENT_SELECTED, 0, SORTKEY FROM TEMP_WBS UNION ALL SELECT WBS.CACHEID, EXT.EXTPROJECTID, EXT.EXTTASKID, WBS.WBSLEVEL, EXT.SORTSEQUENCE, WBS.PAR_SEQ, WBS.NNB_SEQ, WBS.INCLUDE, WBS.VISIBLE, WBS.CLIENT_SELECTED, 1, WBS.SORTKEY FROM TEMP_WBS WBS, TEMP_WBS_EXT EXT WHERE EXT.CACHEID = WBS.CACHEID AND EXT.WBSSEQUENCE = WBS.WBSSEQUENCE
